relevant_findings.general: Mild distress due to headache, but alert and oriented.
relevant_findings.neurological: Left homonymous hemianopia; other cranial-nerve functions normal. Strength, sensation to light touch, and deep-tendon reflexes of arms and legs were normal.
relevant_findings.blood_smear: 0 to 2 schistocytes per high-power field, teardrop and pencil cells, occasional large platelets, normal-appearing white cells.
relevant_findings.urinalysis: 1+ ketones, 2+ blood, 1+ protein, 1+ urobilinogen, specific gravity > 1.040, pH 5, microscopic examination revealed no red cells and 3 to 5 white cells per high-power field.
